text: Is there a way to filter blog posts via date? Most recent etc?

Get the blog posts:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions#blog-recent-postsu|https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions#blog-recent-posts>

Filter the blog posts with this filter function:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters#selectattr>

How do I do the equivalent of this line in a drag and drop builder template?
{{ standard_header_includes|replace('/hs/hsstatic/jquery-libs/static-1.4/jquery/jquery-1.11.2.js', get_public_template_url('/SmoothieBox/assets/libs/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js')) }}

Hi James we have a beta for the ability to remove jQuery I will DM you a link to the form to request access. After disabling jQuery you would then use standard linked js files or require_js to load that javascript file.

I am having an issues with animations not loading on a drag and drop template, that work perfectly on a coded template. Could anyone take a look and see if there is something obvious stopping the animations? Working page (coded) - <https://www.smoothiebox.com/> & Not working (D&Drop) - <https://www.smoothiebox.com/berry>
